reviews.text:
Pleasant little station that now receives electric services.

The station has been refurbished slightly to include waiting shelters and seating with train departure information and a clock.

It has also been cleaned up to look presentable and colourful.

Not a great station as it's only tiny. The trains aren't running between Blackpool North and Preston at the moment so there's a replacement bus service run by Blackpool Transport. Having used it for the first time today I have to say I was very impressed. The buses ran on time and were clean and tidy. Station staff at each stop were helpful and friendly.
Good convenient location, minimal seating and no toilet.
Barely any seats, under constant construction, to get to the other platform with any bag, bike or wheelchair is a three man mission.
No trains running from 11/11/2017 until 25/3/2018 replacement bus service from Benson Road
